name: ColorMazing
description:
Be the first to find your key and unlock your treasure chest. But be careful! You can only pass through door, which have your color! Wooden boxes contain different power-ups enabling you and your fellow player to change players' and doors' colors and might even enable you to steal someone's key or someone else to steal your key.

ColorMazing is a fast-paces four player couch-coop game mainly developed at the HAW GameJam 2018 with some polishing done afterwards.
